level.heading: Priority for recycling.
level.text: The Mayor shall not construct or retrofit any facility in the District for the purpose of solid waste incineration or resource recovery through incineration until all of the provisions of this subchapter are implemented or a 25% reduction in the solid waste stream is achieved through District-wide recycling, whichever comes first.
